comments:
build m5, linux-gtk, redhat 8, j9sc20030205

I got the following NPE after selecting 3 fragments and choosing "delete" from
the context menu. (delete content = true) Note that the reason that I was
deleting the fragments was because their required projects were not in my workspace.
